resources.string: News App is a mobile news system which run under Android platform that used for your own news choice. With powerful and Responsive Admin Panel can manage news category, news item, app profile information, etc. This application created by Android for client side and then JAVA for Admin side. Run under Android platform which is the most popular operating system in the world. Using this application you can entertain yourself
NIAJ MAHMUD\nCSTE at Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications.
